Syntax Error

We show eachother code with no syntax highlighting, and the other person must find out what is wrong with it.

For Scott:

const people = [
  { name: 'wes bos', age: 32 },
  { name: 'scott tolinski', age: 34 }
];

const names = people.map(({
    name,
    parts = name.split(' '),
    first = parts[0],
    last = parts[1] }) => { first, last }));
